title: Bugs and Dodge Penalty's
body: Is there anyway to close the client when your it bugs out so it doesn't count as a dodge and you can re join the champ select?

replies.body: If your client crashes or bugs out, and you're able to get it launched again before the match ends, there should be a 'reconnect' button that you can click to get back into the game. If that button doesn't show up, then that match was probably remade using /remake or it ended already.
Hello thank you, Sorry i didn't make it clear but i was talking about champ select.

Ahhhhh if you're crashing in champ select, that may be something entirely different. If you're getting kicked out of the match lobby there could be something effecting your networks connection to our servers. Check out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to stay in those lobbies.
